channel.title: Development Status
channel.description:
What is the status of new development on redash? Its been 9 months since a release of a docker image. There are 200+ PRs in GH.
Is there another project where resources are getting allocated? Is Redash abandoned?
It looks like a great product, but easy-to-fix bugs are preventing people from being able to use it.
Thanks for any information. I am interested in contributing.
Dave

item.title: Development Status
item.dc:creator: fragkakis
item.description:
I was going to ask the same question. I guess the official response can only be given by @arikfr.

On the other hand, there are obvious signs that can’t lie. These are the contributors analytics in Github. Very little work is being done.

It’s a shame because I love Redash, but it is what it is.

Read full topic
